structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Validation of creation of municipal housing authorities.
law.text: The creation and establishment of housing authorities pursuant to the provisions of the Housing Authority Act (KRS Chapter 80) together with all proceedings, acts and things heretofore undertaken, performed or done with reference thereto, are hereby validated, ratified, confirmed, approved and declared legal in all respects notwithstanding any defect or irregularity therein or any want of statutory authority.
law.history: Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 2. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 71, sec. 1.
